title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2213.25 - Bankruptcy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2213.25 - Bankruptcy

State Regulations

Holders, or entities servicing program loans, shall follow
the procedures outlined in the program's default avoidance and claim manual for
any borrower filing bankruptcy on a program loan. program loans shall be
non-dischargeable pursuant to section 523(a)(8) of the U.S. Bankruptcy

Code. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2213.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
